name: Create new LionDesk contacts from Office 365 People contacts and add them to a campaign
description: Every time a new contact is added on Office 365 People, Make will automatically validate the email using ZeroBounce. If the email status is "valid", it will create a new contact on LionDesk and add that contact to a campaign. It will also send a Slack message. If the contact already exists in LionDesk, it will send a Slack message. If the email status is "invalid", it will delete that contact from Office 365 contacts and send a Slack message.
